resourceTemplates.remark: This relates an Authority or Variant to its administrative metadata, which is, minimimally, a Class defined outside of the MADS/RDF namespace. The RecordInfo Class from the RecordInfo ontology is recommended.
resourceTemplates.author: NDMSO

Profile.title: BIBFRAME 2.0 Agents
Profile.description: Agents are people, organizations, jurisdictions, etc., associated with a Work or Instance through roles such as author, editor, artist, photographer, composer, illustrator, etc.
Profile.author: NDMSO
